attributes.action: to provide the A(H1N1) vaccine to Her Majesty's subjects living abroad
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the PM to provide the A(H1N1) vaccine to Her Majesty's subjects living abroad.

Many countries, such as France, Switzerland and Austria are making the A(H1N1) vaccine available to their citizens living abroad, whilst HM's Government is refusing to do so for British citizens.

An excerpt from a letter from one of your Consuls states: "We have had several enquiries recently about vaccinations against A/H1N1 in Morocco.  As you may be aware, the French Embassy has provided vaccinations to all French citizens in Morocco. The advice from HM Government in the UK is clear:  we cannot provide vaccinations for British citizens overseas.  Information on swine flu can be found on the British Embassy website and also on the Foreign and Commonwealth Office website."

We find this attitude dispectful of the British expat community. We hereby petition the Prime Minister to reverse this decision and make the vaccine available for British citizens, irrespective of their country of residence.
